channel.title: Experienced Server Creators/Owners/Coders Look Here
channel.description: [b][center]Creating a Group Of Experienced Server Coders/Hoster/Owners[/center][/b] [i]I am tired of randompeople making worthless servers that take up space everywhere.[/i] [b]It is time to take action,This server is going to be completely coded from scratch,glitch-free,and lag-free.[/b] Too Start off I need the best of the best coders/hosters/and admins and moderators, to assure this server will be the best of the best. Here are the spots open for these jobs; Coders:1) 2) 3) Hosters:1) 2) 3) Administrators:1) 2) 3) 4) Moderators:1) 2) 3) 4) 5) 6) 7) 8) [b]CAUTION:[/b]These are serious jobs,not to be messed with.If you are not serious and fool around you will not be aloud to help.These are jobs for experienced people ONLY! The reason for multiple hosters is incase one of the hosters loses connection during a storm so the other can boot up the server and make sure it is really 24/7. [center]Also Admin and Mods will be required to be on a certain amount of time each day. MOST IMPORTANT OF ALL!!!Coders will be needed all the time to fix glitches in the system and ensure that there can be no hacking![/center] This might sound rash but if we succeed this will be the best server in all of moparscape! Please E-mail me to takeover oen of these positions and start! conductndestruct@aol.com swgtalkist@aol.com or reply to this post! Remember this will be a silabsoft server and in the future will have a client of its own! I will make the forums and website soon and post URL here! -Thank you for your time Bye!

item.title: Experienced Server Creators/Owners/Coders Look Here
item.dc:creator: @Pink_Bunny Pink Bunny
item.description:
@Pink_Bunny wrote:

[center]Creating a Group Of Experienced Server Coders/Hoster/Owners[/center]
I am tired of randompeople making worthless servers that take up space everywhere.
It is time to take action,This server is going to be completely coded from scratch,glitch-free,and lag-free.
Too Start off I need the best of the best coders/hosters/and admins and moderators, to assure this server will be the best of the best.
Here are the spots open for these jobs;
Coders:1)
2)
3)
Hosters:1)
2)
3)
Administrators:1)
2)
3)
4)
Moderators:1)
2)
3)
4)
5)
6)
7)
8)
CAUTION:These are serious jobs,not to be messed with.If you are not serious and fool around you will not be aloud to help.These are jobs for experienced people ONLY!
The reason for multiple hosters is incase one of the hosters loses connection during a storm so the other can boot up the server and make sure it is really 24/7.
[center]Also Admin and Mods will be required to be on a certain amount of time each day.
MOST IMPORTANT OF ALL!!!Coders will be needed all the time to fix glitches in the system and ensure that there can be no hacking![/center]
This might sound rash but if we succeed this will be the best server in all of moparscape!
Please E-mail me to takeover oen of these positions and start!
conductndestruct@aol.com
swgtalkist@aol.com
or reply to this post!
Remember this will be a silabsoft server and in the future will have a client of its own!
I will make the forums and website soon and post URL here!
-Thank you for your time Bye!
